flexibleContent.heading: Leverage the open-source and renowned eCommerce platform Magento, with us

contentLists.heading: Magento Website Development
contentLists.content: Build a feature-rich and scalable website with our Magento developers. We assure you of guaranteed quality and performance that will meet your expectations.

contentLists.heading: Magento Store Development
contentLists.content: Since Magento is inherently SEO-friendly, all you need is Tachtic’s Magento Development Service to turn every visitor into your customer.

contentLists.heading: Magento Theme Development
contentLists.content: Want to customize a Magento theme to fit your needs? Leave it to us. Our Magento developers build appealing and fully manageable Magento themes.

contentLists.heading: Magento Customization
contentLists.content: Magento offers a variety of commercial functions but to make it correspond to your brand vision; you need our Magento customization service.

contentLists.heading: Magento  Store Design
contentLists.content: You want your eCommerce store design to be magnetic, which compels users to make purchases naturally, and we are committed to delivering the same kind of design.

contentLists.heading: Magento Integration
contentLists.content: Leverage the mighty integration flexibility of Magento and integrate ERP, CRM, PIM, payment, and a whole lot of APIs with a Magento development company.

contentLists.heading: Magento Migration
contentLists.content: Whether you are a B2C or B2B eCommerce platform, you can hire Magento developers at Techtic to seamlessly migrate your store to Magento.

contentLists.heading: Magento 1 To 2 Migration
contentLists.content: Techtic offers a separate and special service to help you migrate from Magento 1 to Magento 2 with all your customers, products, order data, store configurations, etc.

contentLists.heading: Magento Extension Development
contentLists.content: Be it a Magento extension for eCommerce stores or a custom Magento extension development for your SaaS product, we deliver bug-free and standard extensions.

contentLists.heading: Magento Enterprise Solution
contentLists.content: Our Magento Enterprise solution will fulfill your hunger for innovation, flexibility, and simplicity with the highly acclaimed portal.

contentLists.heading: Magento Maintenance & Update
contentLists.content: Sustain your Magento commerce store’s high performance and security with our exceptional Magento Maintenance and Update solution.

contentLists.heading: Can I migrate my existing website/store to Magento platform?
contentLists.content: Yes. We can help you to migrate your existing website or eCommerce store to the Magento platform. Our skilled Magento developer will ensure that your data is migrated from the existing store to your new Magento eCommerce store smoothly.

contentLists.heading: Do you use templates to design my Magento website?
contentLists.content: No, every business deserves a unique design for their Magento eCommerce website. So, our eCommerce designers design mockups of your eCommerce store and take approval from you.

contentLists.heading: Do you provide me support after the Magento Website is developed?
contentLists.content: Yes, at Techtic Solutions, our Magento developers are always eager to provide support and help for your requirements of new features, maintenance and regular updates.

contentLists.heading: Is there any hidden cost?
contentLists.content: TechTic Solutions believe in transparency. So, whatever price we discussed in our quote is final price. So, we are not believed in any hidden cost.

contentLists.heading: Do I own the ownership and the code of my Magento eCommerce Store Project?
contentLists.content: Yes, we will give you code ownership after the completion of Magento eCommerce Store project. However, in some cases, depends on the NDA terms, then we claim ownership.

contentLists.heading: Does your developed Magento eCommerce Store Mobile Friendly & Search Engine Friendly?
contentLists.content:
Yes, our Magento developers build Mobile Friendly & Search Engine Friendly Magento eCommerce stores.

We strictly follow responsive website guidelines and ensure that the Magento eCommerce store works well on a wide variety of screen sizes, from tablets and smartphones to small & large desktop monitors.

We strictly follow all Google Webmaster and other Search engine guidelines while developing the Magento eCommerce stores.

contentLists.heading: Which methodologies and tools do you use to track my Magento eCommerce store development project?
contentLists.content:
We are using Agile project development methodology for meeting deadlines. Meanwhile, we also use cutting-edge project management tools to monitor and track every phase of Magento store development. We build your Magento eCommerce store/website on our development server so that you can monitor the progress of your Magento eCommerce store. Project Management Tools are:

  • Jira
  • Basecamp
  • Trello
  • Slack

contentLists.heading: What are the hiring models for Magento Development Service?
contentLists.content: We offer a fixed time/price model or a fixed dedicated resource model for your Magento eCommerce store development service. You can choose a hiring model as per your project requirement.

contentLists.heading: Can you list some of your developed eCommerce Web store?
contentLists.content: In our 11+ yearâ€™s experience, we have designed and developed many Magento stores. A few of them are Mint Evolutive Timepiece, Printers Parts & Equipment, Iconic Pineapple, etc. You can view all our Magento eCommerce Store Development Projects in our Portfolio section.

contentLists.heading: Why should I choose Magento for my eCommerce store Development?
contentLists.content:
We can choose Magento for eCommerce store development because:

  • Open system architecture helps create unique UX
  • Add customized back-end workflows
  • Easy integration with a horde of third-party services
  • Can create multiple online stores
  • Allows multi-layer navigation
  • Search products as per their respective categories
  • Offers integrated multiple payment methods
  • Allows customers to easily transact
  • Better page load speed
  • High-end caching & DB optimization techniques
  • Superior mobile shopping experiences delivered
  • Allows capabilities for gesture-based controls
  • Comes with drag-and-drop features

contentLists.content:
You can choose Techtic for Magento Development Service because:

contentLists.heading: How much does it cost to develop a Magento eCommerce Store?
contentLists.content: The development cost of Magento eCommerce Store is totally depends upon on the requirements of the project. To know the exact details of the cost to develop a Magento eCommerce Store, get in touch with us to get estimated budget-friendly pricing or you can email us at info@techtic.com.

contentLists.heading: How much time will it take to develop a Magento Website?
contentLists.content: To be honest, it depends. It depends upon the size of your Magento Website and factors like features and functionalities you want to have in your Magento Website development project. To precisely understand in detail please, can email us your Magento Website requirements at info@techtic.com or directly get in touch with us today.
